pages.text:
Blaze Chickens aren't really chickens, which is somewhat obvious if you just... look at them. Still, they're really warm, and a bit metallic to the touch.
Lay Item: Blaze Rods.$(br2)Even though they take after those clangy things from the nether, they're not fireproof. Keep that in mind.

pages.desc: To summon one, you have to put a Fel Pumpkin on top of two stacked Iron Bars.
